cc027dd7-7eed-458a-af19-8b7c328d3ef8.description: Acuity Institute’s Change Management Program has been designed to provide Change Leaders running organizational projects with the tools and skills to initiate change in a project environment. Our program delivers best practices for both tactical and behavioral elements of change from leading experts in a practical and simple way. It includes a superior interactive Change Management Toolkit which leads practitioners through all phases of the Change Management process.
cc027dd7-7eed-458a-af19-8b7c328d3ef8.name: Change Management Professional

alignments.name: Certified Change Management Professional (CCMP)
alignments.description: Acuity Institute is approved as a Qualified Education Provider (QEP) for the Association for Change Management Professionals. The QEP status signals that our Change Management course was reviewed and that it aligns with the ACMP’s Standard for Change Management© (The Standard) and adult education best practices.

alignments.name: Project Management Institute - PDUs
alignments.description: Acuity Institute is an Authorized Training Partner (ATP) of the Project Management Institute (PMI)®. Being an Authorized Training Partner allows Acuity Institute to grant Professional Development Units (PDUs) to customers who complete our qualified programs.

alignments.name: International Association for Continuing Education & Training - CEUs
alignments.description: Acuity Institute has been approved as an Accredited Provider by the International Association for Continuing Education and Training (IACET). In obtaining this approval, Acuity Institute has demonstrated that it complies with the ANSI/IACET Standards which are widely recognized as standards of good practice internationally.

badge_template_activities.title: Training is conducted online and uses a multi-media format that includes audio by Change experts, examples of successful change, interactive simulations and quizzes, and the most current and robust tools and techniques available. The course is “self-paced” and can be accessed at any time – anywhere, which provides the most flexibility in completing the course. On average students complete the Change Management Program in 30 hours (average completion time, actual time may vary).

Upon completion of the course. students must complete the certification exam. Students are required to achieve a passing mark of 80% or higher on the exam. The exam is intended to validate student proficiency with Change Management tools and techniques. The following highlights the exam.  The exam is included in the program.

skills.name: Change Management: Vision And Strategy Planning

e5a5956f-74f0-4c22-9cfd-96f7eba9e741.description: Acuity Institute’s Lean Six Sigma White Belt course has been designed to teach basic Lean Six Sigma fundamentals and its application. It is intended for all associates where Lean Six Sigma is being deployed. White Belts form an important part of a mature Lean Six Sigma deployment. As Lean Six Sigma Projects are executed, the organization will need to be aware of the key tools and concepts of the Lean Six Sigma methodologies.
e5a5956f-74f0-4c22-9cfd-96f7eba9e741.name: Lean Six Sigma White Belt

alignments.name: Council for Six Sigma
alignments.description: Acuity Institute is accredited as an Approved Registered Provider by the Council for Six Sigma Certification (SSC). This accreditation assures each certification includes Lean Six Sigma concepts, tools and techniques considered to be the standard of Lean Six Sigma White Belt within the Council’s Body of Knowledge.

badge_template_activities.title: Students are trained on the basic Lean Six Sigma fundamentals and its application. The course includes 3 lessons and 20+ quiz questions. Training is conducted online and uses a multi-media format that includes audio by Lean Six Sigma experts. The course is “self-paced” and can be accessed at any time – and – anywhere. On average, students complete the course in 6 hours.

a3cc13c4-a0c6-4af1-9cb2-36065dcd210f.description: Acuity Institute’s Lean Six Sigma Black Belt Certification Online Program is the most dynamic certification package available. Acuity’s program takes the learner beyond manufacturing, such as healthcare, financial services, and insurance, making this course diverse enough to be applied in a wide variety of industries. Students are trained and tested on their understanding and ability to apply the tools and techniques of all elements of the Lean Six Sigma DMAIC methodology.
a3cc13c4-a0c6-4af1-9cb2-36065dcd210f.name: Lean Six Sigma Black Belt

alignments.name: Council for Six Sigma
alignments.description: Acuity Institute is accredited as an Approved Registered Provider by the Council for Six Sigma Certification (SSC). This accreditation assures each certification includes Lean Six Sigma concepts, tools and techniques considered to be the standard of Lean Six Sigma Black Belt within the Council’s Body of Knowledge.

alignments.name: Project Management Institute - PDUs
alignments.description: Acuity Institute is an Authorized Training Partner (ATP) of the Project Management Institute (PMI)®. Being an Authorized Training Partner allows Acuity Institute to grant Professional Development Units (PDUs) to customers who complete our qualified programs.

alignments.name: International Association for Continuing Education & Training
alignments.description: Acuity Institute has been approved as an Accredited Provider by the International Association for Continuing Education and Training (IACET). In obtaining this approval, Acuity Institute has demonstrated that it complies with the ANSI/IACET Standards which are widely recognized as standards of good practice internationally.

badge_template_activities.title: Students are trained and tested on their understanding and ability to apply the tools and techniques of all elements of the Lean Six Sigma DMAIC methodology. The course includes 27 lessons and 200+ quiz questions. Training is conducted online and uses a multi-media format that includes audio by Lean Six Sigma experts. The course is “self-paced” and can be accessed at any time – and – anywhere. On average, students complete the course in 150 hours.

At Acuity Institute, we recognize that not every individual has the opportunity to complete an actual Lean Six Sigma project while completing training; therefore, we have created a real world simulated project that takes students from the beginning to the end of a problem and solution. The simulation is designed to illustrate the entire business improvement effort through every phase of the Lean Six Sigma DMAIC methodology.  Students complete 52 challenging exercises and 5 Tollgate Reviews.

Acuity Institute’s Lean Six Sigma Black Belt Certification Exam is the standard for Black Belt Certification.  Upon completing training, students will be required to achieve a passing mark of 80% or higher on the exam.  The exam is intended to validate student proficiency with Lean Six Sigma tools and techniques.

1675619f-2fc9-46fe-a9bd-4db2e740c546.description: Acuity Institute’s Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Certification Program provides all of the knowledge and skills required to effectively manage Lean Six Sigma projects. Where many other Lean Six Sigma Green Belt training programs are intended for only manufacturing operations, Acuity’s program takes the learner beyond manufacturing, such as healthcare, financial services, and insurance, making this course diverse enough to be applied in a wide variety of industries.
1675619f-2fc9-46fe-a9bd-4db2e740c546.name: Lean Six Sigma Green Belt

alignments.description: Acuity Institute is accredited as an Approved Registered Provider by the Council for Six Sigma Certification (SSC). badge_template_activities.title: Students are trained and tested on their understanding and ability to apply the tools and techniques of all elements of the Lean Six Sigma DMAIC methodology. The course is “self-paced” and can be accessed at any time – and – anywhere. On average, students complete the course in 100 hours.

At Acuity Institute, we recognize that not every individual has the opportunity to complete an actual Lean Six Sigma project while completing training; therefore, we have created a real world simulated project that takes students from the beginning to the end of a problem and solution. Acuity Institute’s Lean Six Sigma Green Belt Certification Exam is the standard for Green Belt Certification.  Upon completing training, students will be required to achieve a passing mark of 80% or higher on the exam.  The exam is intended to validate student proficiency with Lean Six Sigma tools and techniques.

8505c2af-1fc1-4a04-8a1b-4dbd8d2992b3.description: Acuity Institute’s Kaizen Leader has been designed to teach Kaizen fundamentals and its application. It is intended for facilitators and participants of a Kaizen Event. Kaizen is a problem-solving approach that applies process improvement in a structured setting. The goal of Kaizen is to eliminate activities in processes that add cost but do not add value. A Kaizen Event is an extremely efficient method to quickly improve poor performing processes.
8505c2af-1fc1-4a04-8a1b-4dbd8d2992b3.name: Kaizen Leader

alignments.name: Project Management Institute - PDUs
alignments.description: Acuity Institute is an Authorized Training Partner (ATP) of the Project Management Institute (PMI)®. Being an Authorized Training Partner allows Acuity Institute to grant Professional Development Units (PDUs) to customers who complete our qualified programs.

badge_template_activities.title: Students are trained and tested on their understanding of the lean tools and techniques to successfully lead a Kaizen Event. The course includes 4 lessons and 40+ quiz questions. Training is conducted online and uses a multi-media format that includes audio by Lean experts. The course is “self-paced” and can be accessed at any time – and – anywhere. On average, students complete the course in 13 hours.

Included in this course is Acuity Institute’s Kaizen Event Simulation. The simulation is designed to illustrate an entire Kaizen Event through every phase of the Kaizen PDCA methodology. When complete, you will have a significant perspective on what true Kaizen business improvement means. The Kaizen Event Simulation includes 7 exercises which are introduced throughout the PDCA Methodology.

0f89f95b-5a47-42f7-9fb7-f69aac72f6b1.description: This course has been designed to teach Lean Six Sigma fundamentals and its application. It equips Yellow Belts to conduct small DMAIC projects within their department or participate as Green Belt or Black Belt project team members. Yellow Belt team members form an important part of a mature Lean Six Sigma deployment. In this course students are trained and tested on their understanding and ability to apply the tools and techniques of various elements of the Lean Six Sigma methodology.
0f89f95b-5a47-42f7-9fb7-f69aac72f6b1.name: Lean Six Sigma Yellow Belt

4ebdfe25-364a-4a1b-ac38-61648ddca0ce.description: Acuity Institute’s Lean Foundations program provides participants with a small set of Lean skills to execute Lean improvements. Many Lean initiatives fail because people do not know where to start or how to sustain improvements. Lean looks at reducing waste and improving flow in an organization. A Lean business produces just what is needed, when it is needed, with no additional labor, costs or time, resulting in bottom line savings.

c6dbc362-410c-405c-9c57-02a3de3f743e.description: Acuity Institute’s Lean Six Sigma Champion course has been designed to teach Lean Six Sigma fundamentals and its application. Lean Six Sigma Champions form an important part of a Lean Six Sigma deployment. As projects are executed, the organization will need support from its Executives and Project Sponsors. This course is designed to teach Senior Leaders how to be effective in deploying and supporting Lean Six Sigma within their organization.

7720c1d4-c7f9-49d7-b809-5d9d77612a4e.description: When an organization is deploying a Lean initiative, it’s imperative that Senior Leadership is adequately prepared to support their Project Leaders and provide guidance when needed. badge_template_activities.title: Students are trained and tested on their understanding of the foundational lean tools and techniques. The course includes 5 lessons and 35+ quiz questions. Training is conducted online and uses a multi-media format that includes audio by Lean experts. The course is “self-paced” and can be accessed at any time – and – anywhere. 2dd78f43-2f16-476e-8e1a-2ddc70cc2fd7.description: This course is designed to provide Belts and Project Leaders the additional tools and concepts necessary to successfully execute DFSS projects. What is Design For Six Sigma (DFSS)? The DMADV methodology is utilized, which stands for Define, Measure, Analyze, Design, and Verify. DFSS is different from the traditional Lean Six Sigma DMAIC methodology. DMAIC reduces defects in existing products or processes, whereas DFSS is often used when designing new products and services.
2dd78f43-2f16-476e-8e1a-2ddc70cc2fd7.name: Design for Six Sigma

a05311d7-5d17-4ef0-bc60-dca16c0510c1.description: In this program students learn the foundations of Change Management and are introduced to Acuity Institute’s Change Management roadmap. While there are numerous approaches to Change Management, Acuity’s Change Management approach encompasses the general industry standard of evaluating the organization issue/problem, initiating action to make change, planning the change , executing the plans , and how to sustain the change and make it “stick” so that the organization truly gains the benefits.
a05311d7-5d17-4ef0-bc60-dca16c0510c1.name: Change Management Foundations

Acuity’s program focuses on non-manufacturing operations, such as financial services and healthcare, making this program diverse enough to be applied in a wide variety of industries.

alignments.description: Acuity Institute is accredited as an Approved Registered Provider by the Council for Six Sigma Certification (SSC). This accreditation assures each certification includes Lean Six Sigma concepts, tools and techniques considered to be the standard of a Master Black Belt within the Council’s Body of Knowledge.

alignments.name: Project Management Institute - PDUs
alignments.description: Acuity Institute is an Authorized Training Partner (ATP) of the Project Management Institute (PMI)®. Being an Authorized Training Partner allows Acuity Institute to grant Professional Development Units (PDUs) to customers who complete our qualified programs.

alignments.description: Acuity Institute has been approved as an Accredited Provider by the International Association for Continuing Education and Training (IACET). In obtaining this approval, Acuity Institute has demonstrated that it complies with the ANSI/IACET Standards which are widely recognized as standards of good practice internationally.

badge_template_activities.title: Acuity Institute’s Change Management course has been designed to provide Change Leaders running organizational projects with the tools and skills to initiate change in a project environment. Our program delivers best practices for both tactical and behavioral elements of change from leading experts in a practical and simple way. It demystifies change by providing students with a superior interactive Change Management Toolkit which leads practitioners through all phases of the Change process.

Acuity Institute’s Lean Professional course provides participants with a structured approach to manage Lean projects in Service and Manufacturing environments and helps you learn how to sustain these improvements. The Lean Professional course follows Acuity’s Lean FOCUS™ Improvement Methodology: Focus, Operate, Create, Utilize and Sustain. The Lean FOCUS™ roadmap assists users in identifying problems and improving and implementing Lean solutions.

Acuity Institute’s Kaizen Leader course has been designed to teach Kaizen fundamentals and its application. It is intended for facilitators and participants of a Kaizen Event. Kaizen is a problem-solving approach that applies process improvement in a structured setting. The goal of Kaizen is to eliminate activities in processes that add cost but do not add value. A Kaizen Event is an extremely efficient method to quickly improve poor performing processes.

Acuity's Design for Six Sigma course is designed to provide Belts and Project Leaders the additional tools and concepts necessary to successfully execute DFSS projects. What is Design For Six Sigma (DFSS)?  The DMADV methodology is utilized, which stands for Define, Measure, Analyze, Design, and Verify. DFSS is often used when designing new products and services.

Acuity Institute’s Presentation Skills course teaches the foundational skills of adult learning, experiential learning, how to structure a presentation, and engage people in a way that enables the achievement of the objectives and intended outcomes. Whether you are facilitating a team meeting, brainstorming session, leadership meeting, presentation or training, this course will help you to properly build your presentation approach, engage your audience and evaluate the impact of the outcomes.

The Applied Statistics course is designed to provide Master Black Belts and experienced Project Leaders the additional statistical tools and concepts necessary to successfully analyze, improve and execute their continuous improvement efforts. Acuity’s curriculum is a dynamic blend of theory and practical application of tools.  Applied Statistics covers the fundamentals of statistics such as the types of data, populations and samples, spread and stability, location and statistical parameters.

Individually complete 3 Business Performance Improvement Projects using any of the following methodologies: DMAIC (Define, Measure, Analyze, Improve, Control), DMADV (Define, Measure, Analyze, Design, Verify), Kaizen (Plan, Do, Check, Act) or Lean (FOCUS: Focus, Operate, Create, Utilize, Sustain).

Knowledge Transfer – Coaching and Training Facilitation. An MBB Candidate is required to complete ONE of the following.  Option 1: Project Coaching – individually coach 4 Business Performance Improvement Project Leaders through project completion. Option 2: Training Facilitation – individually create a one-hour training course, facilitated to two separate groups of participants. Option 3: White Paper Development – individually create a case study on a relevant Performance Improvement topic.

Upon completion of the program requirements, An Acuity Institute “MBB Certification Panel” meets with the MBB Candidate to review the certification documentation provided during the program (the meeting is conducted virtually). The Acuity Institute “MBB Certification Panel” approves the MBB Certification if he/she meets the requirements for MBB Certification.

In obtaining this approval, Acuity Institute has demonstrated that it complies with the ANSI/IACET Standards which are widely recognized as standards of good practice internationally.

badge_template_activities.title: Training is conducted online and uses a multi-media format that includes audio by a Design for Six Sigma expert, examples of successful performance improvement, multiple exercises and quizzes, and the most current and robust tools and techniques available. The course is self-paced and can be accessed at any time – and – anywhere. On average, students complete the course in 30 hours. The course contains 10 Lessons, 40 Quiz Questions, and Multiple Exercises.

Students are required to develop practical application for: Histogram with Descriptive Statistics, Box Plot, Pareto, Scatter Plot, Discrete Sample Size, Continuous Sample Size, Testing for Normality, Attribute Measurement System Analysis, Variable Gage R&R, Process Capability Analysis, Individuals Control Chart, X-Bar & R Control Chart, P-Chart, U-Chart, Linear Regression, Multiple Linear Regression, 2 Sample t-Test, ANOVA, Chi-Square, and Full Factorial Designed Experiment.

The exam is intended to validate student proficiency with the statistical tools and techniques introduced. Upon completing training, students will be required to achieve a passing mark of 80% or higher on the exam.

e3cd4179-52e5-4724-8a29-631a45d90182.description: Agile Project Management Certification from Acuity Institute has both technical expertise and is adept at leading agile project teams. As the expert of Agile and Scrum values, principles, and practices, you will be equipped to serve as a Scrum Master or Agile Project Manager. This certification is evidence of the successful demonstration of the necessary skills and knowledge that are required to be effective in either role. Students earn the APMCTM credential upon completion.
e3cd4179-52e5-4724-8a29-631a45d90182.name: Agile Project Management Certification (APMC)

In obtaining this approval, Acuity Institute has demonstrated that it complies with the ANSI/IACET Standards which are widely recognized as standards of good practice internationally.

badge_template_activities.title: Upon completing these requirements, you will be awarded Acuity Institute’s Agile Project Management Certification. Successful completion of Introduction to Agile, Principles of Scrum, Challenges Leading Agile Teams, Integrating Agile in a Waterfall Environment and the Agile Project Management Professional Certification Exam. Upon completing these requirements, you will be awarded Acuity Institute’s Agile Project Management Certification (APMC™).

88bda79d-62c4-46ac-baaf-79e1bc4db665.description: This certificate equips both new and experienced operations and supply chain managers with the skills and resources necessary to navigate the various logistics, dynamics and methodologies associated with operations and supply chain management. Topics include Logistics and Distribution Management, Operations Management, Procurement and Supply Management, and Supply Chain Basics.
88bda79d-62c4-46ac-baaf-79e1bc4db665.name: Operations and Supply Chain Management Certificate

98663f3c-2b82-45e4-91c0-b9f1c0877518.description: This certificate program will first help you become re-acquainted with your own stores of creativity and innovation. Next, you are given a set of tools that allow you to leverage your creativity to identify and solve organizational problems. Topics include Creativity in Teams and Organizations, Innovation in Teams and Organizations, Introduction to Critical Thinking and Personal Creativity.

8a99ed2a-9231-44a2-a696-cbf0163f62b1.description: Based on D. Quinn Mills’ book, Leadership: How to Lead, How to Live, a text used at Harvard Business School, the courses in this certificate offer advice on leadership that can help you stand out as a leader among your peers. Video segments introduce Dr. Mills and other leaders who discuss such issues as how leaders become leaders, leadership ethics, and the differences between leaders, managers, and administrators.

8953f54a-4da9-4067-b3ce-67c4257103f7.description: Each course in the PM Skills® professional track is a detailed exploration into the skills and tools that make projects easier to manage and help teams work harmoniously towards their common goal: project success. This is not test prep—the goal of PM Skills® and the PMSCP™ certification is to prepare project leaders and teams to guide their organizations towards better team performance and project completion.

426b6edb-801c-46c8-acb2-3ff6342bc331.description: Successful managers know the importance of building strong relationships with their team members. Whether operating in an in-person office environment or a remote work setting, managers will learn practical ways to better coach and motivate their teams.
